update enterprise_prove
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

legal_person_id_card_code = #{legalPersonIdCardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
legal_person_id_card_valid = #{legalPersonIdCardValid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
legal_person_id_card_valid_date = #{legalPersonIdCardValidDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

agent_id_card_code = #{agentIdCardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

agent_id_card_valid_date = #{agentIdCardValidDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
business_licence_pic = #{businessLicencePic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_code_pic = #{orgCodePic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

submit_date = #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
